artist: Utagawa Kunisada II; Miyagi Gengyo; Publisher: Daikokuya Kinnosuke
creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by the Peter B. McCord Collection
dimension:
27 5/8 × 9 13/16 in. (70.17 × 24.92 cm) (image, kakemono-e)
45 5/16 × 13 1/4 in. (115.09 × 33.66 cm) (mount, without roller)
markings: center L edge, diamond intaglio; lower R edge, round black relief; lower R edge, rectangular black relief; lower R edge, rectangular black relief; lower R edge, semicircular red relief
medium: Vertical woodblock print diptych (kakemono-e), ink and color on paper, mounted as a hanging scroll
title: Restaurant Shōgetsurō at Yanagibashi
